name: Tilly and the Wall
description: '''Tilly and the Wall''' was an [[indie pop]] group from [[Omaha, Nebraska|Omaha]], [[Nebraska]]. Their name originated from a children's book called ''[[Tillie and the Wall]]'', written by [[Leo Lionni]]. They are particularly noted for having  a [[tap dance]]r, Jamie Pressnall, provide [[percussion]], instead of a [[drummer]].
